questions.text: How do you feel right now, in one sentence?
What is one thing you are grateful for today?
What has been your biggest stressor today?
What would make today 1% better?
What emotion is strongest right now, and why?
What did you do today that you’re proud of?
What do you need more of right now: rest, connection, or clarity?
What’s one small win from today?
What thought keeps showing up today?
If your mood had a color, what would it be?
What is something you can let go of today?
What is one thing you can control right now?
What is one thing you cannot control — and can accept for today?
What is one kind thing you can do for yourself in the next hour?
What part of today felt the most draining?
What part of today felt the most energizing?
How present do you feel right now (1–10) and why?
What is one worry you can write down and postpone until later?
What would you tell a friend who feels like you do today?
What is one boundary you need today?
What is one thing you did today that aligned with your values?
What is one thing you learned about yourself recently?
What is your body asking for right now?
Where in your body do you feel tension? Describe it.
What is one moment today you’d like to remember?
What is one thing you want to forgive yourself for?
What is a task you can break into one tiny next step?
What is one supportive habit you want to strengthen this week?
What is one unhelpful habit you want to reduce — gently?
What is one sentence that describes your day so far?
What is one thing you’re looking forward to (even small)?
What is one place where you feel safe and calm?
What is one thought you can reframe into something kinder?
What is one way you showed resilience recently?
What is one relationship you want to nurture?
What is one thing you can appreciate about yourself today?
If today had a soundtrack, what would it be like?
What is one thing you can do in 2 minutes to feel better?
What does ‘enough’ look like for you today?
What is one intention you want to set for tomorrow?
